bug.description:
Hi, I am using the 'updated' element of the annotation xml and noted that the date/time given is not that of the system time. Interestingly, the discrepancy is also consistent with the logs printed in CVAT. I post a line from the logs for clarity. <denchmark-code>cvat | 2019-08-05 07:47:55,481 DEBG 'runserver' stderr output:
2019-08-05 08:52:49.193254+03:00 </denchmark-code>
The first line's date time is in sync with the system time, which seems to be displayed in UTC +0. I perform a update of the annotation and dumped it. The 2nd line is a printout that i extract from the annotation xml. The time is skewed by a couple of hours. Am i missing something?

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/jax79sg>@jax79sg</denchmark-link> , I agree they should be synchronized.
